name: Work Less, Play More
description:
Office work can be tedious after some time.

Why don't you leave the work for a moment and do something refreshing for a bit?

A VR game where you punch and kick your way through waves of monster sounds fun and make for a good stretching after plenty of hours sitting at your desk.

Just make sure your boss doesn't see you while you're at it!

CONTROLS

A - Ground attack to your left

D - Ground attack to your right

Q - Air attack to your left

E - Air attack to your right

Space - Pretend to work/Return to playing

ESC - Pause

CREDITS

Derian Ardenichson - Game Designer and Programmer

Ferry - Game 2D Artist

Lauretta Gail Rosalind Wijaya - Game Sound Artist

Sebastian Putra Cahyadi - Game Sound Artist
